sense.gloss: natural, right, proper, just, reasonable, appropriate, deserved
naturally, as a matter of course, rightly, deservedly, justly, of course
at that time, in those days
being in charge (of an area of responsibility), being responsible (for a work role, etc.)
corresponding to (in meaning, function, etc.), being equivalent to
to be proportionate to, to be in keeping with, to be deserving of, to be worthy of
usual, common, ordinary, commonplace, the norm
at first, at the beginning, initially, originally
suitable, proper, appropriate, adequate, fit, fair
perfunctory, half-minded, sloppy, lazy, careless, noncommittal, unreliable, irresponsible, haphazard

sdata.j: ↑残念↑↓ざんねん↓ながらそれは↑本当↑↓ほんとう↓なのです。
その↑答↑↓こた↓えを↑知↑↓し↓るのにあなたは↑本当↑↓ほんとう↓にその↑質問↑↓しつもん↓をする↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓があるのかしら。
sdata.e: Do you really need to ask the question to know the answer?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑本当↑↓ほんとう↓に↑優先↑↓ゆうせん↓↑順位↑↓じゅんい↓がおかしいよ。
sdata.e: You really don't have the right priorities!

sdata.j: 「↑洞穴↑↓ほらあな↓の↑中↑↓なか↓で↑何↑↓なに↓が↑起↑↓お↓こっているんだろう？すごく↑知↑↓し↓りたいなあ」「↑見当↑↓けんとう↓もつかないよ」
sdata.e: What's going on in the cave? I'm curious. "I have no idea."

sdata.j: ↑本当↑↓ほんとう↓にありがとう。
↑本当↑↓ほんとう↓にありがとう！
ほとんどの↑科学↑↓かがく↓↑的↑↓てき↓↑進歩↑↓しんぽ↓は↑当然↑↓とうぜん↓のことについての↑発見↑↓はっけん↓に↑過↑↓す↓ぎない。
sdata.e: Most scientific breakthroughs are nothing else than the discovery of the obvious.

sdata.j: あなたがじゃがいもを↑買↑↓か↓うように↑奇蹟↑↓きせき↓を↑買↑↓か↓うことができないなんて↑本当↑↓ほんとう↓に↑残念↑↓ざんねん↓だわ。
sdata.e: It's a pity that you can't buy miracles like you would buy potatoes.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑本当↑↓ほんとう↓に↑賢↑↓かしこ↓いよね？
